com.practo.jedi.controllers

Class ListingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.practo.jedi.controllers.ListingController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/listings")
public class ListingController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller which handles all the api requests corresponding to Listing table. Handles the api requests for GET,POST,UPDATE,DELETE
    Author:
    chetan
